attributes.action: remove Andrew Motion from his post as Poet Laureate and replace him with Scroobius Pip (David Meads).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Andrew Motion's poetry is completely irrelevant to modern Britain and its residents. David Meads, more commonly known as Scroobius Pip (of Dan Le Sac vs Scroobius Pip fame), is the most talented poet in the country. He should be our Poet Laureate: he would make our country proud.
